response.overview: Anondi got a job in a news channel. She took a house for rent near her office. One day she met Rajarshi. They fell in love. After that she used to see an unknown weird girl. The girl wants to tell her something. She calls her. Anondi got frightened and starts to take counseling. Suddenly she wants to die. Why? Who is the girl?
response.title: Mrityur Haatchhani
